body_html:
Rather than use torch.jit.const this new update uses a statically declared list of constant attributes to distinguish when the script module should treat a property as a constant and enforce its const-ness:

class Foo(ScriptModule):
     __constants__ = ['a', 'b', 'c']
body:
Rather than use `torch.jit.const` this new update uses a statically declared list of constant attributes to distinguish when the script module should treat a property as a constant and enforce its const-ness:

```
class Foo(ScriptModule):
     __constants__ = ['a', 'b', 'c']
```
